section_title: MALTA S PROPOSAL TO AMEND CONVENTION ANNEX I:
sentences: This issue was first taken up by the COP plenary on Wednesday, 9 December when Malta outlined its proposal to join Annex I ( FCCC/CP/2009/2 ), noting that by joining the EU in 2004 it has taken on responsibilities in line with those of Annex I parties.
The proposal was then considered during informal consultations facilitated Stephen de Boer (Canada).
On 18 December, the COP plenary adopted a decision to include Malta in Convention Annex I ( FCCC/CP/2009/L.2 ).
Malta expressed his thanks to the COP for adopting the decision.
